__e: She might be evidence of an affair, or she might be an obstacle to someone getting a big, fat legacy.
Because all I ever see is an impediment to getting my work done.
Which has never been that much of an obstacle to you.
If Lily is an obstacle, I'll handle it.
My biggest obstacle is I don't know who I am.
All obstacles are worth 30 points, and only the top two competitors will be moving on.
